original_text: Even if they fast, I will not listen when they ask me for help. I will not accept the burnt offerings or grain offerings that they offer to me. Instead, I will use war, famine and disease to destroy them.’ Even if they fast, I will not listen when they ask me for help. I will not accept the burnt offerings or grain offerings that they offer to me. Instead, I will use war, famine and disease to destroy them.’ Even if they fast, I will not listen when they ask me for help. I will not accept the burnt offerings or grain offerings that they offer to me. Instead, I will use war, famine and disease to destroy them.’
korean_text: 그들이 금식할지라도 내가 그 부르짖음을 듣지 아니하겠고 번제와 소제를 드릴지라도 내가 그것을 받지 아니할 뿐 아니라 칼과 기근과 전염병으로 내가 그들을 멸하리라

sentences.original_text: Even if they fast,
I will not listen when they ask me for help.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나에게 도움을 청할 때 나는 듣지 않겠다.

sentences.original_text: I will not accept the burnt offerings
or grain offerings that they offer to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그들이 나에게 드리는 곡물 제물도 받지 않겠다.

sentences.original_text: Instead,
I will use war, famine and disease
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 전쟁, 기근, 그리고 질병을 사용하겠다.

sentences.original_text: to destroy them.'
